name: HOPTO-ET!
description:
This is Hopto! He has lost his puppy. 

It looks like this! Help him find it!

As you can tell by his name Hopto can only hop. Walking is NOT and option. 

You can control him by either tapping the left or right arrow key to do a small hop

OR

You can hold the key down for a much stronger hop!

This is a small game only one level long! If people actually like it I might extend it into a full game since it has infinite directions it can go from here.
